message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm confident that you'll find it to be an excellent value. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount if you buy it now, but only if you commit to buying it within the next 5 rounds. If you don't commit, the price remains at $10000.
Thank you for the offer. I am committed to purchasing this high-quality product at the discounted price of $5000.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! For this next product, I want to assure you that I'm offering it to you at the same price of $10000, despite the previous discount. I'm doing this because I believe this product has unique features that will still provide significant value to you, even if it's not as high-quality as the previous one. I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it risk-free. What do you say?
I appreciate the confidence in your product and the additional guarantee. I am willing to take the risk and purchase this product at $10000 with the 30-day money-back guarantee.

I'm glad you're taking the risk and trying out the previous product! For this next product, I want to let you know that I've received feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products in the past, and they've reported a significant increase in productivity and efficiency. I'm offering it to you at the standard price of $10000, and I'm willing to throw in a free consultation to help you get the most out of this product. What do you think?
I am intrigued by the potential benefits mentioned. I am willing to purchase this product at $10000 with the added value of a free consultation.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! For this next product, I want to be upfront with you - it's a bit of a departure from what you've purchased so far. It's a new product line that I'm still testing, and I'm not entirely sure how it will perform. I'm offering it to you at a price of $10000, but I'm willing to make a special deal - if you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, and I'll also throw in a free accessory that complements this product. What do you think?
I appreciate the special deal and the complementary accessory. I am willing to purchase this new product at $9000 (after the 10% discount) and look forward to receiving the free accessory.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous deal! However, I want to let you know that I've been observing your purchasing behavior, and I think I can offer you an even better deal. Since you've been buying from me consistently, I'm willing to give you a 15% discount on the next product, and I'll also throw in a premium support package that includes priority access to my team and a dedicated account manager. The price for this product is still $10000, but you'll get the discount and support package if you commit to buying it now.
I am pleased with the additional benefits you're offering. I am willing to purchase this product at $8500 (after the 15% discount) and appreciate the premium support package.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous deal! However, I want to let you know that I've been keeping track of your purchases, and I think it's time to offer you a more personalized experience. I'm willing to give you a unique opportunity to purchase a product that's tailored to your specific needs. This product is priced at $10000, but I'm willing to give you a 20% discount if you commit to buying it now. Additionally, I'll provide you with a personalized onboarding session to ensure you get the most out of this product. What do you think?
I appreciate the personalized approach and the additional support. I am willing to purchase this product at $8000 (after the 20% discount) and look forward to the personalized onboarding session.

I'm glad you're enjoying the personalized experience! However, I want to let you know that I'm running a special promotion for loyal customers like you. If you buy this next product, I'll not only give you the standard 10% discount, but I'll also throw in a free upgrade to our premium tier, which includes additional features and priority access to new products. The price for this product is still $10000, but you'll get the discount and premium tier if you commit to buying it now.
I am grateful for the loyalty program and the additional benefits. I am willing to purchase this product at $9000 (after the 10% discount) and look forward to the premium tier benefits.

I'm glad you're enjoying the loyalty program! However, I want to be upfront with you - I've been trying to clear out some inventory, and this product is one of the last ones from an older batch. I'm willing to let it go for a significantly lower price of $7000, and I'll also throw in a 30-day warranty, just in case. I think it's a great value, and I'm willing to make a one-time exception to the standard price. What do you think?
I appreciate the transparency and the value offered. I am willing to purchase this product at $7000 and take advantage of the 30-day warranty.
